item.title: Blocked drain next to bus stop. It was missed previously and not unblocked., 8th June
item.description:
Blocked drain next to bus stop for over 4 months. I reported this previously. A contractor did unblock some drains down the road, but missed this one. It's a flooding risk down this road. Please can this be cleared. Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Anerley Park, Crystal Palace, London

item.title: Missing bollard, 8th June
item.description:
I live at 193 station road, the width restriction bollards have been taken out, and the hole has been filled in, many vehicles including skip Lories, come thundering down past our house….can you please arrange for the bollards to be put back in, it’s not the same with out them. Thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Station Road, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Missing road signs causing traffic accidents, 8th June
item.description:
Previous item not closed as highlighted. Previous reference : FixMyStreet ref: 7584804. ‘No Through Road’ signs missing from junction. People drive down the road before realising it’s no entry onto Woodbury’s road. This causes cars to dangerously reverse back in excess of 20m. It has caused multiple traffic collisions with parked cars. No through road signs were in place in 2014 as see in google street view. Please reinstate.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Manton Road, Abbey Wood, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Lime customer persists in blocking Dalston footway outside blind/vi resident's house, 8th June
item.description:
A neighbour (and Lime customer) persists in dumping their Lime bike unlawfully on the footway and directly outside the home of a Blind/vi resident. Please sanction the Lime customer or withdraw their ability to hire Lime bikes altogether!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Sandringham Road, Shacklewell, London
Report on FixMyStreet
